root: ^Yes! I have finally crafted it! The compass that leads to the greatest supply of Beholderite!
^Please stop, Netrixi. We have been looking for you. You are under arrest for possession of Beholderite.

Netrixi_fights_Folkvar: ^Oh come on, I don't want to fight you...
^Don't worry, you won't have to after this. Because then, you're going to do everything I say.
^Fine, but I will need to check in with my father.
Netrixi_convinces_Folkvar: ^This compass leads to the biggest supply of Beholderite in the Iron Region.
^That could not be! My father, the King, has secured all known Beholderite in the castle, and that does not point to our castle.
^Then we need to figure out what is going on. Someone might be hiding Beholderite.
^You have a point. However, I must return to the castle and ask my father for permission. But Netrixi?
^You will get many more slaps on the wrist if you are attempting to fool me.
^I would never. But first, I need a drink. It's been a long day.
